wikipedia_page.main: Islay Conolly, MBE (born 1923) is a Caymanian teacher and school administrator. Serving as a teacher and principal at various schools on the islands, she became Chief Education Officer in 1970. She has been honored by the Caymanian government with the Spirit of Excellence Award during National Heroes Day and was first recipient of the Chamber of Commerce's  Lifetime Achievement Award in Education. Conolly was honored as a member of the Order of the British Empire in 1981.
